conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (victim);Violation of Art. 10;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF BOWMAN v. THE UNITED KINGDOM - [Russian Translation]
issue: Representation of the People Act 1983, section 75
scl: Sunday Times v. the United Kingdom (no. 1) judgment of 6 November 1980, Series A no. 38, p. 13, § 23;Lingens v. Austria judgment of 8 July 1986, Series A no. 103, p. 26, § 40 and §§ 41-42;Mathieu-Mohin and Clerfayt v. Belgium judgment of 2 March 1987, Series A no. 113, p. 22, § 47, pp. 23-24, §§ 52 and 54;Norris v. Ireland judgment of 26 October 1988, Series A no. 142, p. 16, § 31
